name: StarPilot W
description:
In the year 2550,  fly your star fighter through gauntlet of challenges to reach the high score and survive the longest. Experience stunning and realistic 3D graphics on WASM-4 and hone your skills in this cutting edge action game!

Instructions

Use the D-Pad (Arrow Keys) to fly your ship:

  • Left/Right to roll left or right
  • Down to pull back on the control stick and direct your star fighter up
  • Up to push forward on the control stick and direct your star fighter down

Press Button One (Space-bar) to fire torpedoes at oncoming obstacles

Press Button Two (C) to use boost for score-multiplication and timing challenges

Scoring

Score points for every gate you fly through and every asteroid you destroy. The longer you play the more points you score!

To score more, use the boost to fly faster. All scoring is DOUBLED when flying at boost speed.

Health

Be careful! While your ship can survive several collisions with asteroids, you'll quickly be destroyed if you collide with a gate!

Source

Source available here: https://gitlab.com/Spaceman1701/wasm2-jam2
